title: Acronis & Paragon Ultimate Boot CD USB 2009 1.1
description:
Acronis & Paragon Ultimate Boot CD USB 2009 1.1

Changes:

- changed application name
- changed Paragon Hard Disk Manager 2009 Suite to Professional
- updated Memtest86+ (2.11)
- updated Acronis True Image Home 2009 (12 build 9709)

Fixed:
- now Acronis True Image Home 2009 is full version

Added:
- some version info

Utilities:
:: Acronis Disk Director Suite 10.0
:: Acronis Drive Cleanser 6.0
:: Acronis Migrate Easy 7.0
:: Acronis True Image Home 2009
:: Memtest86+
:: Paragon Disk Wiper 8.5 Professional
:: Paragon Drive Backup 9 Professional
:: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 2009 Professional

Screenshots:
- http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1295/ubcdusb1ix7.png (main)
- http://img397.imageshack.us/img397/6018/ubcdusb2kj5.png (utilities)

HOWTO USB: Mount and copy all files inside the iso to a folder named "root" where makeusb.cmd is. Then from command line issue this command:

makeusb.cmd root X: (X is the USB stick should be less than 4GB)

Comments and suggestions appreciated!!!
